alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:31PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jackson, northwestern Gadsden, southwestern Decatur and southeastern Seminole Counties through 415 PM EDT/315 PM CDT/... At 331 PM EDT/231 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles east of Marianna, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chattahoochee, Greensboro, Sneads, Gretna, Grand Ridge, Reynoldsville, Douglas City, Rosedale, Recovery, Lovedale, Jinks, Dellwood, Buena Vista, Seminole State Park, Mount Pleasant, Hardin Heights, Faceville, Haynes, Hardaway and Drakes Still. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
